name: Greek Salad
description: A refreshing mix of tomatoes, green bell peppers, cucumbers, onions, olives, and feta cheese, perfect for a light, healthy meal.

name: Oiled Pizza
description: A hearty dish featuring roasted butternut pumpkin, with a rich blend of spices and herbs for a satisfying and savory flavor.

name: Olivas Rellenas
description: A delicious combination of avocados stuffed with crab meat, red onions, and a savory crab salad, all nestled in red and green bell peppers.

name: Lasagne
description: A classic Italian dish made with layers of pasta, cheese, ground meats, and tomato sauce, topped with savory seasonings and spices.

name: Tokusen Wagyu
description: Premium wagyu beef, known for its marbled texture and rich flavor, served with fresh vegetables and aromatic spices for a luxurious dining experience.

name: Greek Salad
description: A fresh, vibrant salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and feta cheese, drizzled with olive oil and seasoned to perfection.
